description:
The interface does not scale so everything is tiny, which makes it too hard to use. 
Restoring and backing up settings does not work.
I found this last year when looking for a program to download entire playlists for youtube, it does that very well among so many other things. I absolutely love this app.
summary: Best media downloader, even among propriatory programs

description: the UI is kinda ugly and feels alien on any desktop because of Java, but the functionality is invaluable
the clipboard monitor feature is my favorite
summary: useful for downloading files and resuming

description:
Having tried tried many downloaders - many web based, I found this application some time ago.

I have it installed on both windows and Linux computers and use it regularly.

To initiate a download, all that is required is to highlight the particular URL and simply 'Copy' -(ctrl and C).
J Downloader then takes over and downloads to your designated folder.

One feature that I particularly like is it's ability to process a 'PlayList'. 
Go to the Channel Home Page and select "Videos". 
After COPYing the URL a message pops up asking if you wish to process the entire playlist or just the title video.
If the 'Playlist' option is selected, ALL the videos on that particular channel are downloaded automatically.

It is very easy to configure the download destination. Simply create a new folder with an appropriate name. Change the 'destination' in the Settings page to that folder - and off you go! An entire channel of videos in their own separate folder.

There are also options to determine which components are downloaded and which are ignored - i.e. Video, audio, subtitles, text, JPG's etc.

If you enjoy watching and collecting videos from your favourite channel, JDownloader is a 'Must Have' for a simple life'

Five stars ! I can't fault it.

Thanks for reading this far
summary: This is my "Go To" downloader for YouTube etc

description: Figured out how to use the software easily and was downloading in minutes. Great app, and works FAST!
summary: Easy to use, even for a newbie

description: I use jDownloader on all my systems.
This app I have been using for years to download videos from media sites. It's 'deep search' also enables it to find most media files on a web page.
summary: Fantastic app that just about downloads from any site

description:
Hi, The software work well, but with GDrive in some files (same source and same download directory) give me an error of "Invalid Download Directory" in external drive, but in other files download with same download directory works well. All permision from the ubuntu software permision button and the snap connect external... 
I need some help!
Been using it for years now, works very well
FSTAB not working

i do like jdownloader 2 for an option to download videos from the web, however, something is not right in linux and i am running kubuntu. what happens is i am able to download a few videos and then it completely stops working until i reboot my system (this is a never ending loop). i am tired of having to reboot my system. i have used this application on windows and have not experienced this situation happening. this is really annoying so have been looking for fixes. i am giving it one star at this point becuase of this.
summary: stops working until i reboot then same thing

description:
Super Programm um Medien jeglicher Art zu downloaden! Unterstütz contrainer und captchas sowie viele Filehoster Premium-Accounts!
Das must-have tool!!

Ein mächtiger Downloadmanager, welcher trotzdem noch von einem DAU wie mir bedient werden kann. Als snap optisch gefälliger als die Variante über das herkömmliche Installationsskript & es gibt ENDLICH keine hässlichen & doppelten Symbole in den Menüs mehr. Mein Dank an den/die Entwickler!
summary: Seit Jahren das Downloadprogramm meiner Wahl, als snap noch besser!
